alert.note: Alert for Black Mesa Area; Chuska Mountains and Defiance Plateau; Eastern Mogollon Rim; Western Mogollon Rim; White Mountains (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 28 at 11:00PM MST until December 29 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Periods of snow. Snow heavy at times. Areas of blowing and drifting snow. New snow accumulations between 1 and 4 inches, with locally higher amounts possible. * WHERE...Areas near Alpine, Buffalo Pass, Doney Park, Flagstaff, Forest Lakes, Ganado, Heber-Overgaard, Pinetop- Lakeside, Shonto, Show Low, Whiteriver, Williams and Window Rock. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Slippery and snow covered roads could led to very difficult travel. Patchy blowing snow could reduce visibility at times. Additional snow forecast from 10 PM Today to 5 AM Wednesday: Alpine 1 to 3 inches Buffalo Pass 1 to 3 inches Doney Park 0 to 1 inches Flagstaff 1 to 3 inches Forest Lakes 2 to 4 inches Ganado 1 to 3 inches Heber-Overgaard 1 to 2 inches Pinetop-Lkside 2 to 4 inches Shonto 0 to 1 inches Show Low 1 to 3 inches Whiteriver 0 to 1 inches Williams 1 to 2 inches Window Rock 1 to 3 inches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Black Mesa Area; Chuska Mountains and Defiance Plateau; Eastern Mogollon Rim; Western Mogollon Rim; White Mountains
